file_comment.description: File comment to add reaction to. Now that [file threads](/changelog/2018-05-file-threads-soon-tread#whats_changed) work the way you'd expect, this argument is deprecated. Specify the timestamp and channel of the message associated with a file instead.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message to add reaction to.

file.description: File to add reaction to. Now that [file threads](/changelog/2018-05-file-threads-soon-tread#whats_changed) work the way you'd expect, this argument is deprecated. Specify the timestamp and channel of the message associated with a file instead.

channel.description: Channel where the message to add reaction to was posted.
